message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  $12,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to get a better deal.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product.  This price reflects the value to me and leaves some room for us both to benefit.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $11,250. This price still reflects the product's value to me, but I'm willing to compromise to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
